pageContext.public_note: Enrollment begins in May. For more info, or to be contacted automatically when registration begins, please contact Michael Luong at Michael@play-well.org, or call (424) 672-5496.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: A NEW Play-Well offering for girls who love to build! Taught by women engineers and scientists, this course will provide a supportive environment for girls to build engineer-designed projects such as skyscrapers, bridges, mazes, and motorized cars. Explore the endless creative possibilities of the LEGO building system with the guidance of an experienced Play-Well instructor.
